restaurants.name: Sugarbeet
restaurants.description: Locally owned casual-elegant restaurant offering seasonal, locally sourced New American cuisine with an inventive cocktail menu. Named as an homage to Longmont's Great Western Sugar Factory.

restaurants.name: Martinis Bistro
restaurants.description: Longmont's premier fine-dining establishment housed in an 1890s home featuring classic cocktails, center-cut ribeye, and Boulder County's largest outdoor patio.

restaurants.name: Rosalee's Pizzeria
restaurants.description: East Coast-style pizza with homemade sausage, garlic knots, and a cozy setting with pinball machines and live music.

restaurants.name: Jefes Tacos & Tequila
restaurants.description: Creative tacos from traditional al pastor to inventive chipotle crab, paired with signature margaritas and an impressive tequila selection.

restaurants.name: Cheese Importers
restaurants.description: European-style marketplace featuring over 350 cheeses, including Colorado's largest walk-in cheese and cured meat refrigerator.

restaurants.name: Tortugas
restaurants.description: Operating since 1994 in a converted home, this cozy venue features fresh seafood with Caribbean and Cajun influences.

restaurants.name: Aunt Alice's Kitchen
restaurants.description: An iconic Longmont diner serving breakfast staples and hearty comfort food since 1981. Known for chicken fried steak and prime rib.

restaurants.name: Flavor of India
restaurants.description: Authentic Indian cuisine since 2006 with a Main Street location featuring a rooftop patio and full bar.

restaurants.name: Westside Tavern
restaurants.description: Intimate gastropub in Longmont's historic Westside neighborhood offering sophisticated cocktails and creative dishes.

restaurants.name: Left Hand Brewing Company
restaurants.description: Award-winning craft brewery known for Nitro Stout with a seasonal beer garden and rotating tap selection.

restaurants.name: Wibby Brewing
restaurants.description: German-inspired lager brewery with an expansive outdoor biergarten hosting live music and community events.

restaurants.name: Dry Land Distillers
restaurants.description: Craft distillery in a historic Main Street building producing gin with Colorado botanicals and cactus spirit.
